item.title: Communal clash in Raichur over offensive Instagram post against Prophet Muhammad
item.description:
<![CDATA[Raichuru, July 17: A communal clash erupted between trouble mongers of two communities at R H Camp-2 in Sindhanur taluk of Karnatakaâ€™s Raichur district last night after female Hindutva activist posted a derogatory remark against Prophet Muhammad on Instagram.
Police officials have arrested four persons and lodged complaints against 35 people in this connection.
Tense situation prevailed in the village following group clash between people of two communities. One person, who was injured in the i...]]>
